Verses: 1 aadhiyile Vaarththai Irundhadhu, Andha Vaarththai Dhevanidaththilirundhadhu, Andha Vaarththai Dhevanaayirundhadhu.
2 avar Aadhiyile Dhevanodirundhaar.
3 sagalamum Avar Moolamaai Undaayitru; Undaanadhondrum Avaraaleyallaamal Undaagavillai.
4 avarukkul Jeevan Irundhadhu, Andha Jeevan Manusharukku Oliyaayirundhadhu.
5 andha Oli Irulile Pragaasikkiradhu; Irulaanadhu Adhaip Patrikkollavillai.
6 dhevanaal Anuppappatta Oru Manushan Irundhaan, Avan Per Yovaan.
7 avan Thannaal Ellaarum Visuvaasikkumpadi Andha Oliyaik Kuriththu Saatchikodukka Saatchiyaaga Vandhaan.
8 avan Andha Oliyalla, Andha Oliyaikkuriththu Saatchikodukka Vandhavanaayirundhaan.
9 ulagaththile Vandhu Endha Manushanaiyum Pragaasippikkira Oliye Andha Meyyaana Oli.
10 avar Ulagaththil Irundhaar, Ulagam Avar Moolamaai Undaayitru. Ulagamo Avarai Ariyavillai.
11 avar Thamakku Sondhamaanadhile Vandhaar, Avarukku Sondhamaanavargalo Avarai Etrukkollavillai.
12 avarudaiya Naamaththinmel Visuvaasamullavargalaai Avarai Etrukkondavargal Eththanaipergalo, Aththanai Pergalum Dhevanudaiya Pillaigalaagumpadi, Avargalukku Adhigaarankoduththaar.
13 avargal, Raththaththinaalaavadhu, Maamsa Siththaththinaalaavadhu Purushanudaiya Siththaththinaalaavadhu Piravaamal, Dhevanaale Pirandhavargal.

14 andha Vaarththai Maamsamaagi, Kirubaiyinaalum Saththiyaththinaalum Niraindhavaraai, Namakkulle Vaasampanninaar; Avarudaiya Magimaiyaik Kandom; Adhu Pidhaavukku Ore Peraanavarudaiya Magimaikku Etra Magimaiyaagave Irundhadhu.

15 yovaan Avaraikkuriththu Saatchikoduththu: Enakkup Pinvarugiravar Enakku Munnirundhavar, Aagaiyaal Avar Ennilum Menmaiyullavar Endru Naan Solliyirundhene, Avar Ivardhaan Endru Saththamittuk Koorinaan.
16 avarudaiya Paripooranaththinaal Naamellaarum Kirubaiyinmel Kirubai Petrom.
17 eppadiyenil Nyaayappramaanam Moseyin Moolamaaik Kodukkappattadhu, Kirubaiyum Saththiyamum Yesukristhuvin Moolamaai Undaayina.
18 dhevanai Oruvanum Orukkaalun Kandadhillai, Pidhaavin Madiyilirukkira Oreperaana Kumaarane Avarai Velippaduththinaar.
19 erusalemilirundhu Yoodhargal Aasaariyaraiyum Leviyaraiyum Yovaanidaththil Anuppi: Neer Yaar Endru Kettapozhudhu,
20 avan Marudhaliyaamal Arikkaiyittadhumandri, Naan Kristhu Alla Endrum Arikkaiyittaan.
21 appozhudhu Avargal: Pinnai Yaar? Neer Eliyaavaa Endru Kettaargal Adharku: Naan Avan Alla Endraan. Neer Theerkkadharisiyaanavaraa Endru Kettaargal. Adharkum: Alla Endraan.
22 avargal Pinnum Avanai Nokki: Neer Yaar? Engalai Anuppinavargalukku Naangal Uththaravu Sollumpadikku, Ummaikkuriththu Enna Sollugireer Endru Kettaargal.
23 adharku Avan: Karththarukku Vazhiyai Sevvaipannungal Endru Esaayaa Theerkkadharisi Sonnapadiye, Naan Vanaandharaththile Kooppidugiravanudaiya Saththamaayirukkiren Endraan.
24 anuppappattavargal Pariseyaraayirundhaargal.
25 avargal Avanai Nokki: Neer Kristhuvumalla, Eliyaavumalla, Theerkkadharisiyaanavarumallavendraal, En Gnaanasnaanan Kodukkireer Endru Kettaargal.
26 yovaan Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Jalaththinaale Gnaanasnaanankodukkiren; Neengal Ariyaadhirukkira Oruvar Ungal Naduvile Nirkiraar.
27 avar Enakkup Pinvandhum Ennilum Menmaiyullavar; Avarudaiya Paadharatchaiyin Vaarai Avizhppadharkum Naan Paaththiranalla Endraan.
28 ivaigal Yordhaanukku Akkaraiyil Yovaan Gnaanasnaanankoduththa Peththaaparaavile Nadandhana.
29 marunaalile Yovaan Yesuvaith Thannidaththil Varakkandu: Idho, Ulagaththin Paavaththai Sumandhutheerkkira Dheva Aattukkutti.
30 enakkuppin Oruvar Varugiraar, Avar Enakku Munnirundhapadiyaal Ennilum Menmaiyullavarendru Naan Sonnene, Avar Ivardhaan.
31 naanum Ivarai Ariyaadhirundhen; Ivar Isravelukku Velippadumporuttaaga, Naan Jalaththinaale Gnaanasnaanan Kodukka Vandhen Endraan.
32 pinnum Yovaan Saatchiyaaga Sonnadhu: Aaviyaanavar Puraavaippola Vaanaththilirundhirangi, Ivarmel Thanginadhaik Kanden.

33 naanum Ivarai Ariyaadhirundhen; Aanaalum Jalaththinaal Gnaanasnaanankodukkumpadi Ennai Anuppinavar; Aavyaanavar Irangi Yaarmel Thanguvadhai Nee Kaanbaayo, Avare Parisuththa Aaviyinaal Gnaanasnaanankodukkiravarendru Enakku Solliyirundhaar.
34 andhappadiye Naan Kandu, Ivare Dhevanudaiya Kumaaran Endru Saatchi Koduththu Varugiren Endraan.
35 marunaalile Yovaanum Avanudaiya Seesharil Iranduperum Nirkumpodhu,
36 yesu Nadandhupogiradhai Avan Kandu: Idho, Dheva Aattukkutti Endraan.
37 avan Appadi Sonnadhai Avvirandu Seesharunkettu, Yesuvukkup Pinsendraargal.
38 yesu Thirumbi, Avargal Pinsellugiradhaik Kandu: Enna Thedugireergal Endraar. Adharku Avargal: Rabee, Neer Enge Thangiyirukkireer Endru Kettaargal; Rabee Enbadharkup Podhagare Endru Arththamaam.
39 avar: Vandhu Paarungal Endraar. Avargal Vandhu Avar Thangiyirundha Idaththaik Kandu, Andraiyathdhinam Avaridaththil Thanginaargal. Appozhudhu Erakkuraiyap Paththumani Velaiyaayirundhadhu.
40 yovaan Sonnadhaik Kettu, Avarukkup Pinsendra Iranduperil Oruvan Seemon Pedhuruvin Sagodharanaagiya Andhireyaa Enbavan.
41 avan Mudhalaavadhu Than Sagodharanaagiya Seemonaik Kandu: Mesiyaavaik Kandom Endru Sonnaan; Mesiyaa Enbadharkuk Kristhu Endru Arththamaam.
42 pinbu, Avanai Yesuvinidaththil Koottikkonduvandhaan. Yesu Avanaip Paarththu: Nee Yonaavin Maganaagiya Seemon, Nee Kebaa Ennappaduvaai Endraar; Kebaa Enbadharkup Pedhuru Endru Arththamaam.
43 marunaalile Yesu Galileyaavukkuppoga Manadhaayirundhu, Pilippuvaikkandu: Nee Enakkup Pinsendru Vaa Endraar.
44 pilippenbavan Andhireyaa Pedhuru Enbavargaludaiya Ooraagiya Pedhsaayidhaa Pattanaththaan.
45 pilippu Naaththaanvelaik Kandu: Nyaayappramaanaththile Moseyum Theerkkadharisigalum Ezhudhiyirukkiravaraik Kandom; Avar Yoseppin Kumaaranum Naasareththooraanumaagiya Yesuve Endraan.
46 adharku Naaththaanvel: Naasareththilirundhu Yaadhoru Nanmai Undaagakkoodumaa Endraan. Adharkup Pilippu: Vandhu Paar Endraan.
47 yesu Naaththaanvelaith Thammidaththil Varakkandu Avanaikkuriththu: Idho, Kabadatra Uththama Isravelan Endraar.
48 adharku Naaththaanvel: Neer Ennai Eppadi Ariveer Endraan. Yesu Avanai Nokki: Pilippu Unnai Azhaikkiradharku Munne, Nee Aththimaraththin Keezhirukkumbodhu Unnaik Kanden Endraar.
49 adharku Naaththaanvel: Rabee, Neer Dhevanudaiya Kumaaran, Neer Isravelin Raajaa Endraan.
50 yesu Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Aththimaraththin Keezhe Unnaik Kanden Endru Naan Unakku Sonnadhinaaleyaa Visuvaasikkiraai; Idhilum Peridhaanavaigalaik Kaanbaai Endraar.

51 pinnum, Avar Avanai Nokki: Vaanam Thirandhirukkiradhaiyum, Dhevathoodhargal Manushakumaaranidaththilirundhu Erugiradhaiyum Irangugiradhaiyum Neengal Idhumudhal Kaanbeergal Endru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
